EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_9AM POSH: Hands-on Virtual Meetup for Apache Geode #1 - Getting Star
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: Pivotal Open Source Hub (POSH): Hands-on Virtual Meetup for Apache Geode #1 - Getting Started
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, We are looking forward to having you join tomorrow's webinar Pivotal Open Source Hub (POSH): Hands-on Virtual Meetup for Apache Geode #1 - Getting Started. If you haven't done so yet, we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, June 2, 2015 Time: 9:00AM PDT (San Francisco, GMT-07:00) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=ecf0f3743ed107a3ecb98de6eaf52133b> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 663 140 375 Thank you,
